Name: OphthalmologyBodySiteEye
Title: Ophthalmic anatomical location
Descriptino: Describes the ophthalmic structure being referenced

Name: OphthalmologyConditionCodesValueSet
Title: Ophthalmology Condition ICD10 and SNOMED codes ValueSet
Descriptino: Clinical findings for the eye region.

Name: OphthalmologyIOPMethods
Title: Intraocular pressure (IOP) method valueset
Descriptino: Describes the various methods of capturing IOP that relate to the IOP Observation profile

Name: OphthalmologyObservableEntitiesValueSet
Title: Ophthalmology observations (SNOMED)
Descriptino: Concept descends from 363926002 - Eye/vision observable (observable entity)

Name: ObservationStatus
Title: Observation Status
Descriptino: Describes whether a recorded observation is either final or amended

Name: OphthalmologyOCTMaculaObservableEntitiesValueSet
Title: OCT Macula Observable Entities ValueSet
Descriptino: OCT Macula observations coding

Name: OphthalmologyOCTRNFLObservableEntitiesValueSet
Title: OCT RNFL Observable Entities ValueSet
Descriptino: OCT RNFL observations coding

Name: OphthalmologyVisualAcuityObservableEntitiesValueSet
Title: Visual acuity method valueset (SNOMED)
Descriptino: Describes the visual acuity observation result, where concept descends from 363983007 (Visual acuity)

Name: OphthalmologyVisualFieldObservableEntitiesValueSet
Title: Visual Field Observable Entities ValueSet
Descriptino: Visual field observation coding

Name: OphthalmologyProceduresValueSet
Title: Ophthalmology Procedures Valueset
Descriptino: This ValueSet represents procedure codes for clinical and billing purposes.

Name: BodyStructureQualifiers
Title: Ophthalmic anatomical location qualifiers
Descriptino: Describes whether a recorded observation is either final or amended

Name: Pupil-Diameter-Comparison
Title: Pupil-Diameter-Comparison
Descriptino: A ValueSet containing codes for various pupillomotor function observations.

Name: PupilFunctionConfounders
Title: Pupil Function Confounders
Descriptino: ValueSet including codes that represent confounders due to pupil function that may affect visual acuity measurements.

Name: LensTypes
Title: Lens Types
Descriptino: This ValueSet includes all SNOMED CT codes that are descendants of 'Contact lenses, device' (57368009) and 'Eye glasses, device' (50121007).

Name: OphthalmologyVisualAcuityMethods
Title: Visual Acuity Measurement Methods valueset
Descriptino: Describes the various charts that can be used to assess visual acuity where concept descends from 400912000 (Visual acuity test equipment (physical object))

Name: OptotypePresentation
Title: Optotype Presentation ValueSet
Descriptino: A ValueSet that includes codes representing the type of optotype presentation used during visual acuity testing.

Name: Optotypes
Title: Optotype ValueSet
Descriptino: A ValueSet that includes codes representing optotype used during visual acuity testing.

Name: PinholeOccluderUsage
Title: Pinhole Occluder Usage Values
Descriptino: This ValueSet contains SNOMED CT codes to represent whether a pinhole occluder was used during a visual acuity measurement.

Name: PupiTestingActiveSubstances
Title: Pupil Testing Active Substances
Descriptino: This ValueSet contains codes to represent active substances used in pharmacological testing during pupil diameter measurements.

Name: ValueSet-right-left-both-eyes
Title: ValueSet-right-left-both-eyes
Descriptino: ValueSet containing laterality codes for ophthalmic observations which may contain information on one or both eyes

Name: ValueSet-right-left-eyes
Title: ValueSet-right-left-eyes
Descriptino: ValueSet containing laterality codes for ophthalmic observations which should only contain information on either the right or left eye, not both

Name: RoomBrightnessLevels
Title: Room Brightness Levels
Descriptino: This ValueSet contains codes to represent the brightness of the room where a test was performed.

Name: Special VA testing Parameters
Title: Special VA testing Parameters
Descriptino: This ValueSet contains codes to represent whether special testing parameters, such as a pinhole occluder or glare light, were used during a visual acuity measurement.

Name: VisualAcuityCategoricalValues
Title: Visual Acuity Categorical Values
Descriptino: ValueSet containing categorical values for visual acuity observations.

Name: VisualAcuityCorrectionMethods
Title: Visual Acuity Correction Methods
Descriptino: Methods of correction used during a visual acuity test.

Name: VisualAcuityCorrectionMethods
Title: Visual Acuity Correction Methods
Descriptino: Methods of correction used during a visual acuity test.

Name: VisualAcuityTestDistance
Title: Visual Acuity Test Distance
Descriptino: Codes representing the distances at which visual acuity tests are performed.

Name: VisualAcuityQuantityUnits
Title: Visual Acuity Quantity Units
Descriptino: Units of Measure of Visual acuity
